data.name: Dave
data.text: Re : 树洞怎么插代码啊aaa

post.text:
# 批量取消关注脚本
```python
import requests
import json
user_token = 'xxx' # 替换为你的token
url1 = 'https://api.thuhole.com/contents/post/attentions?page=%d&jsapiver=v2.2.3.254-449030&user_token=%s' % (1, user_token)
r = requests.get(url1)
js1 = json.loads(r.text)
pid_list = [i['pid'] for i in js1['data']]
url2 = 'https://api.thuhole.com/edit/attention?&jsapiver=v2.2.3.254-449030&user_token=%s'%(user_token)
for pid in pid_list:
    print('unsubscribe %d' % pid)
    requests.post(url2, data={'pid': pid,'switch': 0})
```
